text: Albert Charles "Chase" Fawcett (April 5, 1863 – January 1, 1934) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the United Farmers party representing Westmorland County from 1921 to 1925. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1863 births Category:1948 deaths
title: A. Chase Fawcett
